title: Software Engineer 2021-U-820 NEW!
full_description: Join ICES on a new contract supporting USGS as a Software Engineer. These positions are located in Denver, CO. As a Software Engineer, specific responsibilities include, but are not limited to:Duties:•    Design, modify, develop, write and implement software programming applications•    Support and/or install software applications and/or operating systems•    Participate in the testing process through test review and analysis, test witnessing and certification of software•     Apply experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goalsRequired Qualifications:•    Bachelor’s degree in related technical or scientific field•    A minimum of 4-6 years demonstrated experience in the field or related areaDesired Qualifications:•    Master’s degree or higher in related technical or scientific fields•    Prior experience supporting USGS programs
